INSERT /*MS-YRD-F-INVESTIGATION-CREDIT-SCHEME-INSERT*/ INTO f_investigation_credit_scheme(form_id,project_code,project_name,customer_id,customer_name,industry_code,industry_name,credit_amount,time_limit,time_unit,busi_type,project_channel_id,project_channel_name,project_sub_channel_id,project_sub_channel_name,capital_channel_id,capital_channel_name,capital_sub_channel_id,capital_sub_channel_name,loan_purpose,repay_way,charge_phase,charge_way,charge_rate,charge_type,deposit,deposit_type,deposit_account,statement,other,process_flag,raw_add_time) VALUES (#formId#, #projectCode#, #projectName#, #customerId#, #customerName#, #industryCode#, #industryName#, #creditAmount.cent#, #timeLimit#, #timeUnit#, #busiType#, #projectChannelId#, #projectChannelName#, #projectSubChannelId#, #projectSubChannelName#, #capitalChannelId#, #capitalChannelName#, #capitalSubChannelId#, #capitalSubChannelName#, #loanPurpose#, #repayWay#, #chargePhase#, #chargeWay#, #chargeRate#, #chargeType#, #deposit#, #depositType#, #depositAccount#, #statement#, #other#, #processFlag#, #rawAddTime#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
sqlMap.update: update /*MS-YRD-F-INVESTIGATION-CREDIT-SCHEME-UPDATE*/ f_investigation_credit_scheme set form_id=#formId#, project_code=#projectCode#, project_name=#projectName#, customer_id=#customerId#, customer_name=#customerName#, industry_code=#industryCode#, industry_name=#industryName#, credit_amount=#creditAmount.cent#, time_limit=#timeLimit#, time_unit=#timeUnit#, busi_type=#busiType#, project_channel_id=#projectChannelId#, project_channel_name=#projectChannelName#, project_sub_channel_id=#projectSubChannelId#, project_sub_channel_name=#projectSubChannelName#, capital_channel_id=#capitalChannelId#, capital_channel_name=#capitalChannelName#, capital_sub_channel_id=#capitalSubChannelId#, capital_sub_channel_name=#capitalSubChannelName#, loan_purpose=#loanPurpose#, repay_way=#repayWay#, charge_phase=#chargePhase#, charge_way=#chargeWay#, charge_rate=#chargeRate#, charge_type=#chargeType#, deposit=#deposit#, deposit_type=#depositType#, deposit_account=#depositAccount#, statement=#statement#, other=#other#, process_flag=#processFlag# where (scheme_id = #schemeId#)

update /*MS-YRD-F-INVESTIGATION-CREDIT-SCHEME-UPDATE-BY-FORM-ID*/ f_investigation_credit_scheme set project_code=#projectCode#, project_name=#projectName#, customer_id=#customerId#, customer_name=#customerName#, industry_code=#industryCode#, industry_name=#industryName#, credit_amount=#creditAmount.cent#, time_limit=#timeLimit#, time_unit=#timeUnit#, busi_type=#busiType#, project_channel_id=#projectChannelId#, project_channel_name=#projectChannelName#, project_sub_channel_id=#projectSubChannelId#, project_sub_channel_name=#projectSubChannelName#, capital_channel_id=#capitalChannelId#, capital_channel_name=#capitalChannelName#, capital_sub_channel_id=#capitalSubChannelId#, capital_sub_channel_name=#capitalSubChannelName#, loan_purpose=#loanPurpose#, repay_way=#repayWay#, charge_phase=#chargePhase#, charge_way=#chargeWay#, charge_rate=#chargeRate#, charge_type=#chargeType#, deposit=#deposit#, deposit_type=#depositType#, deposit_account=#depositAccount#, statement=#statement#, other=#other#, process_flag=#processFlag# where (form_id = #formId#)

update /*MS-YRD-F-INVESTIGATION-CREDIT-SCHEME-UPDATE-BY-PROJECT-CODE*/ f_investigation_credit_scheme set form_id=#formId#, project_name=#projectName#, customer_id=#customerId#, customer_name=#customerName#, industry_code=#industryCode#, industry_name=#industryName#, credit_amount=#creditAmount.cent#, time_limit=#timeLimit#, time_unit=#timeUnit#, busi_type=#busiType#, project_channel_id=#projectChannelId#, project_channel_name=#projectChannelName#, project_sub_channel_id=#projectSubChannelId#, project_sub_channel_name=#projectSubChannelName#, capital_channel_id=#capitalChannelId#, capital_channel_name=#capitalChannelName#, capital_sub_channel_id=#capitalSubChannelId#, capital_sub_channel_name=#capitalSubChannelName#, loan_purpose=#loanPurpose#, repay_way=#repayWay#, charge_phase=#chargePhase#, charge_way=#chargeWay#, charge_rate=#chargeRate#, charge_type=#chargeType#, deposit=#deposit#, deposit_type=#depositType#, deposit_account=#depositAccount#, statement=#statement#, other=#other#, process_flag=#processFlag# where (project_code = #projectCode#)
